title: [Atoll, Stone Platform]
description: Dark waters pool against the edges of the atoll and a stone platform, churning against the crystal blue sea further out.  The once white sands are now dark and stained with striations of burn marks.  The air shimmers in rainbow hues toward the center of the atoll.

Dark waters pool against the edges of the atoll, churning against the crystal blue waters further out.  The once white sands are now dark and stained with striations of burn marks.  The air shimmers in rainbow-hues toward the center of the atoll.
